text: Novigrad ("New Town") may refer to several places in Croatia: * Novigrad, Istria County, a town in Istria, a former bishopric and Latin Catholic titular see * Novigrad, Zadar County, a municipality in Zadar County * Novigrad na Dobri, a village in Netretić Municipality, Karlovac County * Novigrad Podravski, a municipality in Koprivnica-Križevci County == See also == * Novi grad (disambiguation) * Starigrad (disambiguation) * Grad (toponymy)
title: Novigrad
